name: How-To-Human
description:
A human body is easy to control right? Well...

In a parallel 2020, humanity have sent their first explorer to Mars. Suddenly, he's taken over by an otherworldly lifeform, which takes full control of his body! The citizens of Earth have no idea what awaits them...

You must guide your human body back to Earth as best you can.  But beware - what might be no big deal to someone like you, might be to someone who's never had to control one before.

Good luck!  You're, uh, probably going to... need it...

Created by Tobi & Tonko, with help from Benjamin,  for the Create Jam Spring 2021, under the themes of "Other Worlds" and the challenge of  "Other Lifeforms".

Control using keyboard

Can you beat the developers'  fastest time of 1:45 min?
